https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8nNq59A6wCDkkAJ6JwQ0E5QLUjK.jpg Chile, 1983. Gladys is a brave young woman who lives in La Victoria, a marginal neighborhood of Santiago with her mother and daughter during the Pinochet dictatorship. One day they receive a young missionary, Samuel Thompson, who, with his camera, records how the population lives in such an adverse scenario. Damn Kids
